mapper.select: select * from reply where bNo = #{bNo} and bType = 1 order by writtenDate desc
mapper.insert: insert into reply(bNo, replyer, replyContent, bType) values(#{bNo}, #{replyer}, #{replyContent}, '1')
mapper.update: update reply set replyContent = #{replyContent}, writtenDate = now() where replyNo = #{replyNo} and bType = 1
mapper.delete: delete from reply where replyNo = #{replyNo} and bType = 1
